mapper.select: select count(*) as study_cnt from tstd s, tuser u where s.representation = u.id

select * from ( select rownum rn, sn, grp_sn, representation, representation_name, name, start_date, end_date, start_time, end_time, repeat_cycle, repeat_day, information, on_off, on_url, place_id, expense, capacity, status, reg_date, upd_date from ( select s.sn, s.grp_sn, u.id as representation, u.name as representation_name, s.name, s.start_date, s.end_date, s.start_time, s.end_time, s.repeat_cycle, s.repeat_day, s.information, s.on_off, s.on_url, s.place_id, s.expense, s.capacity, s.status, s.reg_date, s.upd_date from tstd s, tuser u where s.representation = u.id and s.status='STST01' and (select (current_date - (select start_date from tstd where sn = s.sn)) * 24 * 60 as min_diff from dual) <= 0 order by start_date, sn asc ) where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

select * from ( select rownum rn, sn, grp_sn, representation, representation_name, name, start_date, end_date, start_time, end_time, repeat_cycle, repeat_day, information, on_off, on_url, place_id, expense, capacity, status, reg_date, upd_date from ( select s.sn, s.grp_sn, u.id as representation, u.name as representation_name, s.name, s.start_date, s.end_date, s.start_time, s.end_time, s.repeat_cycle, s.repeat_day, s.information, s.on_off, s.on_url, s.place_id, s.expense, s.capacity, s.status, s.reg_date, s.upd_date from tstd s, tuser u where s.representation = u.id and (select (current_date - (select start_date from tstd where sn = s.sn)) * 24 * 60 as min_diff from dual) > 0 order by sn asc ) where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
